snippet: Angelina Jolie will receive the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award; the actors Angela Lansbury and Steve Martin and the costume designer Piero Tosi will receive Governors Awards this fall.
lead_paragraph: Angelina Jolie will receive the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award; the actors Angela Lansbury and Steve Martin and the costume designer Piero Tosi will receive Governors Awards this fall.

headline.main: Jolie Among 4 Recipients of Honorary Oscars

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
